skill.name: planning-with-files
skill.description: Transforms workflow to use Manus-style persistent markdown files for planning, progress tracking, and knowledge storage. Use when starting complex tasks, multi-step projects, research tasks, or when the user mentions planning, organizing work, tracking progress, or wants structured output.
skill.summary: Transforms workflow to use Manus-style persistent markdown files for planning, progress tracking, an...
skill.author: OthmanAdi

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-only skill with no executable code. It provides workflow patterns for using markdown files to manage complex tasks. No security risks identified.

content.user_title: Organize complex tasks with persistent markdown files
content.value_statement: Complex tasks lose focus when context gets long. This skill creates persistent markdown files that act as external memory, keeping goals visible and progress tracked throughout execution.
actual_capabilities: Creates structured markdown files for task planning
Provides templates for task tracking and note-taking
Includes error logging and recovery patterns
Offers attention manipulation techniques from Manus
limitations: Requires manual file creation and updates
Needs discipline to maintain file updates

use_cases.title: Multi-step debugging sessions
use_cases.description: Track complex bug investigations with persistent notes on code locations, error patterns, and attempted fixes.

use_cases.title: Information synthesis tasks
use_cases.description: Organize research findings across multiple sources with structured notes and deliverable creation.

use_cases.title: Feature development planning
use_cases.description: Plan and track feature implementations with clear phases, decisions, and progress updates.

prompt_templates.title: Create task plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a task_plan.md file with clear phases for this project. Include goal, key questions, and status tracking.

prompt_templates.title: Update progress
prompt_templates.prompt: Read task_plan.md and update it to mark the current phase complete. Add any errors encountered and change status.

prompt_templates.title: Store research findings
prompt_templates.prompt: Create notes.md to store these research findings with sources and synthesized insights.

prompt_templates.title: Deliver final output
prompt_templates.prompt: Read the notes and create the final deliverable markdown file based on all research and work completed.

output_examples.input: Research the benefits of morning exercise
output: All phases marked complete in plan

best_practices: Always create task_plan.md before starting complex work
Read the plan file before making major decisions
Store large outputs in files, not context
Log all errors with resolutions in the plan
anti_patterns: Don't skip creating a plan file for complex tasks
Don't hide errors - log them for learning
Don't stuff everything in context window
Don't forget to update progress after each phase

faq.question: When should I use this pattern?
faq.answer: Use for multi-step tasks, research projects, or any work requiring organization across multiple tool calls.

faq.question: What files do I need to create?
faq.answer: Create task_plan.md for tracking, notes.md for research, and a deliverable file for final output.

faq.question: How does this help with long contexts?
faq.answer: By storing information in files and re-reading the plan, goals stay in the attention window throughout execution.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes, adapt the templates to your needs while maintaining the core structure of goals, phases, and status.

faq.question: What if I encounter errors?
faq.answer: Log all errors in the plan file with resolutions. This builds knowledge for future similar tasks.

faq.question: Is this based on real AI research?
faq.answer: Yes, this implements context engineering principles from Manus, acquired by Meta for $2 billion in 2025.
